purpose_and_location: Application for exception to SWR 10 for down-hole commingling oil production from SPRABERRY (TREND AREA), MABEE (STRAWN), LOWE (ATOKA), and LOWE (MISS.) fields in ANDREWS County, Texas.
recommendation: The Commission approved the application to down-hole commingle oil production. The well will be assigned to the SPRABERRY (TREND AREA) field for allowable and reporting purposes. Commission authority (Form W-1 approval) is required to complete the well in each subject zone. The SWR 10 Exception is effective October 10, 2011, and expires October 18, 2013 if not used. Maximum daily allowable production limited to top allowable for SPRABERRY (TREND AREA) field, effective upon receipt of Form W-2 and 24-hour production test results. Completion report must indicate perforations by field; wellbore diagram may be required.
footnotes: Hydrogen sulfide restriction: No. Duplicate acreage assignment not acceptable. Secondary recovery operations may require zone segregation. Surface-commingling authority may need amendment or cancellation.
